snippet: Violence in Tripoli and Benghazi in recent weeks has killed hundreds of people, the United Nations said in a report that described summary executions, abductions and torture.
abstract: United Nations reports that hundreds of people, including many civilians, have been killed in violence in Libya.
lead_paragraph: Violence in Tripoli and Benghazi in recent weeks has killed hundreds of people, the United Nations said in a report that described summary executions, abductions and torture.

headline.main: Libya Militia Fighting Takes Toll on Civilians, U.N. Says
